attributes.text: Python is a dynamically typed language.
attributes.feedback: Correct! Python does not require variable type declarations.

attributes.text: Python uses curly braces for code blocks.
attributes.feedback: Incorrect. Python uses indentation for code blocks.

attributes.text: A list in Python is mutable.
attributes.feedback: Correct! Lists can be changed after creation.

attributes.text: A tuple in Python is mutable.
